Pre-Game Insights: India have won their first three matches in the World Cup
Bangladesh have a 3-1 ODI record against India in the last 12 months
India's bowling attack, led by Jasprit Bumrah, has taken 28 out of a possible 30 wickets so far
Bangladesh's most recent memory of Kuldeep Yadav is his eight-wicket haul in the Chattogram Test late last year
Miscellaneous Highlights: India won by 7 wickets with 51 balls remaining
This is Bangladesh's first ODI against India in India in 25 years
Others: Bangladesh coach Chandika Hathurusinghe is waiting for the results of a scan done on Shakib Al Hasan before making a decision on his availability
India's bowling coach Paras Mhambrey stated that every team will pose a challenge in the World Cup
